title: Party Error Message
body: Just thought it might be something to bring to others attention it's not really harmful just annoying but this message keeps popping up every time I open a party. http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/276221328436867103/D535F11B3C35838FB23BFFCDCFBFE99AA34A4A9D/

replies.body:
Hey there,

[This is currently a known issue and a hotfix should be released soon.](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/AnHEmOh7-club-tag-creation-disabled-and-server-error-message-in-client)
